Disaster relief funding is finally headed to the President’s desk. I’m pleased NC families, small businesses, & our military bases, including Camp Lejeune, will now have the resources needed to rebuild & recover from #HurricaneFlorence.

Disaster relief was needlessly delayed again last week. It is unacceptable that political grandstanding has kept families from getting the help they badly need. Let’s get disaster relief to the President’s desk immediately.
